body.p: The accountability of the Trustees shall be ensured, inter alia, through:

li.p: a commitment made by each Trustee to act in the public interest;
their commitment to report to and engage with the Monitoring Board according to the terms described in sections 19–24;

a review of the strategy of the IFRS Foundation and its effectiveness, such review to include consideration of the structure of the organisation (if appropriate) and changing the geographical distribution of Trustees in response to changing global economic conditions, and publishing the proposals of that review for public comment at the latest every five years after the conclusion of the most recent review; and
a similar review subsequently every five years.
